REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1418 reute r f BC-PHOENIX-RE-<PXRE>-INI 03-25 0060

TEXT.TITLE: PHOENIX RE <PXRE> INITIAL OFFERING UNDER WAY
TEXT.BODY: Phoenix Re Corp said an initial public offering of 2,500,000 common shares is under way at 13 dlrs each through underwriters led by American Express Co's <AXP> Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc subsidiary and Advest Group Inc <ADV>. Phoenix Re was formed by Phoenix Mutual Life Insurance Co. Reuter
